alert.note: Alert for Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:39PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones County through 1015 PM CDT... At 938 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Anson to Hawley, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anson, Hawley, Nugent, Funston, Hodges, Lake Fort Phantom Hill and The Intersection Of Us-180 And Farm Road 600. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
